column5: i just called Tony's in Dryden and was quoted $44 for 1 LB of leeches. Seems high. Is this the going rate?
$39 per pound at Rainy Lake Sports in Fort Frances, that is before tax. 13% HST on top of that. Anglers Pro in Nestor Falls is $40.
$38 plus taxes is what we have paid the last couple of years outside of Thunder Bay.
Any idea on prices in Vermillion Bay or Red Lake?

I called two days ago and found the following: Kakabecca Falls from Larry $38.00, Ignace from Verne's $44.00, Lake Savant Troy & Penny's $35.00. I did talk to the trapper in Ignace and he said they were starting to Pod and probably would not have any by August 1st. Best to call ahead and have some reserved.
